snippet: A Quinnipiac University poll found that 60 percent of voters want the city to continue slapping stickers on the windows of cars that violate alternate-side parking rules.
abstract: A Quinnipiac University poll found that 60 percent of voters want the city to continue slapping stickers on the windows of cars that violate alternate-side parking rules.

headline.main: New Yorkers Want to Keep Parking Stickers, Poll Says
